protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

text: For 5 day-old seedlings, total RNA was extracted by the phenol/SDS method (Sambrook et al., 2001).
5 day-old hy1 and its wild type (Ler ecotype)were grown on 0.5x MS 1% gelangum media containing 10 uM GR24 or DMSO (control).  Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.
(Parameters: start time = 5, time unit = days, min temperature = 25, temperature unit = C, media = 0.5x MS)

protocol.text: Advanced data analysis was performed in Genespring 7.3.1.  A per-chip normalization was performed using the 50th percentile of all measurements in order to adjust total signal intensity in each chip. Experimental filtering was performed for presence or marginal in all gene chips.  For each experimental condition, 3 biological replicates were performed.  RMA normalized values expressed as log base2.
